title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 12.11 - Settlement agreement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 12.11 - Settlement agreement

State Regulations
(a) If, at any
point during the informal hearing, the utility and the customer agree to settle
their dispute, the agreement shall be in writing and signed by the customer, the utility representative and the hearing officer. The agreement shall state
that it is binding on parties and may not be appealed. (b) A settlement of an informal review shall
be confirmed by letter from the reviewer to parties. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
12.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
